scripts.postinstall: npx lerna link --force-local && npx lerna run build && npx lerna run copy:package:cjs
scripts.test: echo running all tests is not supported, maybe run: "yarn test:lint"
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json lerna-debug.log yarn-error.log
scripts.clean:packages: lerna exec -- rm -rf dist node_modules yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
scripts.clean:all: yarn clean && yarn clean:dist && yarn clean:modules && yarn clean:packages
scripts.compile:react: smbls convert uikit/ test-react-components/ && cp .build/package-react.json test-react-components/package.json
scripts.kalduna: rimraf -I react/ && smbls convert uikit/ react/ --react --internal-uikit && cp -r .build/kalduna/* react/. && ln -s ../.tmp/node_modules ./react/. && echo 'Run `yarn && yarn start` in react/'
scripts.build:react: yarn pkgify:react && cd test-react-components && yarn build:button && npm publish && yarn link && cd ..
scripts.try:react: rimraf -I test-react-components .smbls_convert_tmp && yarn compile:react && yarn build:react
